name: My first 2d game, completed Godot tutorial
name_original: My first 2d game, completed Godot tutorial
description:
Hello my name is Arty_Foxy I am a beginner game developer I just started coding and made my first 2d game in Godot engine thanks to the GDQuest tutorials.

I will be continuing to make more shot games and when I get a good amount of knowledge of game development I will be starting to make big projects.
